Name: Frequency of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' followed by 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' leading to 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' that result in 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' in cases with amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' by 'STAFF MEMBER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' that are followed by 'Request Payment'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Total 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' done by 'SYSTEM'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities == 'SYSTEM' where ma is the last value of org:resource

Name: Ratio of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' over 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' in cases that end with 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Frequency of activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' for cases where activity 'Payment Handled' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' in processes that involve 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' in relation to 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' in the total process variants leading to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' made per year
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities

Name: Average number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' in a month
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR'
